```{r echo=TRUE}

head(cars)

x_variable <- c(cars$speed)
int <- rep(1,50)

x_mat <- cbind(int, x_variable)
y_mat <- c(cars$dist)

beta <- solve(t(x_mat) %*% x_mat) %*% t(x_mat) %*% y_mat
beta

```


```{r}

regression <- lm(dist~speed, data = cars)
summary(regression)
```
